name: Hexagons.Grid

aliases.name: Grid
aliases.comment: A grid is a Dict of rows

aliases.name: Row
aliases.comment: A row is a Dict of values

aliases.name: Tile
aliases.comment: A tile has coords and some content

values.name: delete
values.comment: Remove content from those axial coordinates within grid

values.name: get
values.comment: Find eventual content in grid on those axial coordinates

values.name: getPoint
values.comment:
Given an hexagonal grid definition (radius and grid),
what's in the hexagon holding this point?
values.type: Float -> Hexagons.Grid.Grid a -> Hexagons.Point -> Maybe.Maybe a

values.name: list
values.comment: Produce a list of all tiles within grid

values.name: set
values.comment: Add or update content to grid on those axial coordinates
values.type: a -> Hexagons.Axial -> Hexagons.Grid.Grid a -> Hexagons.Grid.Grid a

name: Hexagons

aliases.name: Axial
aliases.comment: Axial coordinates of an hexagon with a grid

values.name: axialLine
values.comment:
List all hexagons composing a line between two hexagons.

See [Line Drawing](http://www.redblobgames.com/grids/hexagons/#line-drawing) on Red Blob Games

values.name: axialRange
values.comment:
List all hexagons within given distance of this one.

See [Range](http://www.redblobgames.com/grids/hexagons/#range) on Red Blob Games

values.name: axialToPoint
values.comment: Given hex radius and axial coords, return pixel coords of its center

values.name: dims
values.comment: Given radius, returns width and height of hexagon

values.name: pointToAxial
values.comment: Given hex radius and pixel coords, returns corresponding axial coords
